description:
Chris` Larvitar lives in a forest near Chris family`s Pokémon House. Chris would locked the door at night and returned to his own room and would only take Kumasyun for a walk every now and then. One night a Yogiras came to the window and saw Chris` Cubchoo inside. It unlocked the door and the two of them went under a nearby wall to go play in the forest.
Being a young boy, Chris is a bit naive and didn`t realize that his Kumasyun might want to do other things other than live in its well provided for Pokémon House. After finding out that his Kumasyun had made friends with a Yogiras.
Battle with Ash`s Scraggy
To help Chris` Cubchoo get comfortable with the idea of battling other Pokémon, Ash`s Scraggy was sent out to show how to do a battle. The match quickly ended in a draw as they both knocked each other out.
name: Yogiras (Chris)
